iati-activity.title: PPA Regional Activities Jan-Mar 2014
iati-activity.description: The Asia Foundation PPA with DFID CHASE is helping to address common challenges to peaceful state-society relations in fragile states, subnational conflict and post-conflict areas and transitional states at risk of renewed conflict. This activity represents regional activities for the PPA during the period Oct-Dec 2011. This activity includes regional meetings of TAF staff to allow for planning, and exchange of experiences and best practices.
